nodes.text: Big Woolly was a township that was located in the northern reaches of a landmass on the planet Toprawa, and the name of the settlement was a reference to a nearby mountain that was covered in conifers, giving it a fleece-like appearance. In about 18 BBY, the Jedi Knight Jax Pavan and several members of the Whiplash resistance group traveled to Big Woolly, and Pavan and the Gray Paladin Laranth Tarak ventured out in the town to the cantina Mossy Glen Inn, to rendezvous with the Antarian Ranger Aren Folee.
